A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've never felt the need to write a review for a movie until this one I love the Star Wars films and have grown up with them\, but this was an utter disappointment to the name. I just cannot believe the holes in the story as well as how some \"big\" reveals were done along with the overall disjointed non-Star Wars feel to the story. 10/10 biggest film making disappointment of the year.
